overview: Morning wood or morning glory. The question is... how will you work it off? Waking up with a rock hard erection, you know you're gonna start the day with a full tank. You're all juiced-up with plenty in the bank and you have the entire day ahead to spend it! Morning wood is a sure-tell sign that good things are gonna happen!
tagline: Morning wood or morning glory ... Question is: how will you work it off?
title: Morning Wood
